name: Pandora's Fox: An Animal Family Sim
name_original: Pandora's Fox: An Animal Family Sim
description:
Pandora's Fox is an animal family simulation game. A family of foxes have sought refuge in Pandora's garden - help her raise and defend the fox family so that they become strong enough to fight their foes!

This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #24 (August 2020). Theme: Family.

Made by Sage7 using the Godot engine. Sage7 is a small team of self-taught game developers. This is our third game, and our third game jam! A majority of the code and assets were made in the jam's time frame.

Pandora's Fox is replayable and each playthrough takes about 10 mins.
